contenders.name: BURNING BRIDGES
contenders.analysis: SR 82. The only horse with a serious race figure. Experience > hidden promise.

contenders.name: DARYTE
contenders.analysis: Jumpout Black Box flashes red. Trial winner + Pike. Market danger.

contenders.name: TEXAN DREAM
contenders.analysis: Resuming. Needs to improve 15+ points to challenge.

contenders.name: NOTEWORTHY (NZ)
contenders.analysis: VALUE PLAY Class Crush: Drops from G3 La Trice Classic. Massive grade drop.

contenders.name: WITHOUT REG
contenders.analysis: SR 92. The form horse. Won last start with a high rating.

contenders.name: SILVER EYE
contenders.analysis: SR 92. Speed runner who will give a sight.

contenders.name: FLY WITH CAUTION
contenders.analysis: SR 92. Third-up today. Historically peaks at this stage.

contenders.name: BATTLE COMMANDER
contenders.analysis: SR 90. Won last start beating #6. Consistent.

contenders.name: OUR PALADIN AL
contenders.analysis: SR 92. Beaten 0.9L by #7 last time but meets him better at weights.

contenders.name: PLAYIN'IT SWEET
contenders.analysis: LOCK OF THE DAY Golden Gap: SR 98 vs 76. 22-point disparity is massive.

contenders.name: SHE'S HOT
contenders.analysis: Pike rides, but she needs to find 5 lengths to challenge the favorite.

contenders.name: HELLUVA GODDESS
contenders.analysis: Consistent figures (82, 77). Ran 3rd last start in a race that rated well.

contenders.name: DESERT DANCING
contenders.analysis: Right on the heels of the top pick ratings-wise (SR 81).

contenders.name: LATER ALLIGATOR
contenders.analysis: Won last start but the figure was slightly lower (SR 79).

contenders.name: SUPERNATURAL
contenders.analysis: STRONG BET SR 88. Won last start with authority. Fit and in form.

contenders.name: FANCY RED
contenders.analysis: SR 87. Resuming. Pike takes the ride. Class Resumer.

contenders.name: SONOFTHEBOSS
contenders.analysis: Honest, but lacks the 'X-Factor' of the top two.

contenders.name: SOLDANELLE (IRE)
contenders.analysis: STRONG BET SR 82. Won last start at this track/dist. Pike sticks.

contenders.name: DENNIS CHOUX
contenders.analysis: Rates higher (85) but has a wider draw and less momentum.

contenders.name: CAMERA ACTION
contenders.analysis: Third-up and ready to peak. The value knockout.

races.pace: 1800m at Ascot requires a good ride to overcome the barrier.

contenders.name: TERRITORY MAN
contenders.analysis: BEST BET Golden Gap: SR 81 vs 67. Williams/Pike combo.

contenders.name: INVINCIBLE THIEF
contenders.analysis: Next best established form (SR 67).
